    • Method Detail

      • validMotion

        public boolean validMotion(char a,
                           int b,
                           Board board)
        Asserts that the new space (a,b) is either 2 up/down and 1 left/right or 1 up/down and 2 left/right away from the Knight's current position
        Parameters:
        a - x coordinate of new position
        b - y coordinate of new position
        board - Current state of the chess board
        Returns:
        true if the motion fits the Knights's behavior
